title: Introduction
discription: Enivesh Insurance Marketing PVT LTD ('we' or 'us') is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal information. This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect the personal information we collect from visitors to our website.

title: Information We Collect
discription: We may collect personal information from you when you visit our website, fill out forms, request insurance quotes, or communicate with us through our online chat services. The types of personal information we collect may include:
list: Name, address, email address, phone number
Date of birth, gender, marital status, Lifestyle information
Employment information, including occupation and income
Insurance policy details and coverage preferences

title: How We Use Your Information
discription: We use the personal information we collect for the following purposes:
list: To provide insurance quotes, products, and services requested by you
To process insurance applications and manage your insurance policy
To communicate with you about your insurance coverage, claims, and other related matters
To personalize your experience and improve our website, products, and services
To cross-sell any other financial products
To comply with legal and regulatory requirements

title: Disclosure of Your Information
discription: We may share your personal information with third parties for the following purposes:
list: Insurance underwriters and providers to obtain quotes and manage your insurance policy
Service providers and vendors who assist us in providing our products and services
Legal and regulatory authorities as required by law or to protect our rights and property

title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
discription: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website and analyze usage patterns. You can adjust your browser settings to refuse cookies or alert you when cookies are being sent.

title: Security of Your Information
discription: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. We use industry-standard security protocols and encryption technologies to safeguard your information.

title: Your Choices and Rights
discription: You have the right to access, update, and correct your personal information. You may also request to have your information deleted or restrict how we use it. To exercise these rights or opt-out of receiving marketing communications, please contact us using the information provided below.

title: Changes to This Policy
discription: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on our website, and the revised policy will apply to all personal information we have collected after the effective date of the updated policy.
